duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with producers, directors, and team members to maintain project timelines, schedules, and budgets.
Assist in obtaining and managing logistical and essential services required for production.
Liaise with vendors, suppliers, freelancers, and crew members to secure necessary items and crew.
Monitor and track expenses against the approved project budget and maintain budget records.
Serve as a point of communication between producers and departments, ensuring everyone is informed of project developments.
Assist with post-production activities and maintain accurate records of project-related information.
Identify opportunities for process improvement and contribute to refining production workflows.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Film Production, Media, or related field (Master's preferred)
